name.value: Visit the Github repository for more information

description.value: An EntityReference that serves the role of predicate. Note that this varies slightly from the base class of NameAndMeaningReference because the name attribute is a namespace/name combination rather than a simple name scoped exclusively by the domain.

definition.value: An EntityReference that serves the role of predicate. Note that this varies slightly from the base class of NameAndMeaningReference because the name attribute is a namespace/name combination rather than a simple name scoped exclusively by the domain.
